description: Legendary Super Saiyan is a unique and very rare Super Saiyan transformation rather than just a title. The result is a Super Saiyan with a seemingly endless supply of energy. http://anidb.net/ch42921 [Broly], is the Legendary Super Saiyan, a warrior that tales tell is the single strongest being in history. Broly`s final transformation puts him in a class of his own.
name: Legendary Super Saiyan
